overview:
Mrs. Raye G. White is the executive vice president and a director at Fayez Sarofim & Co. and has been with the company since its inception in 1958. Mrs. White is a Chartered Investment Counsellor.

Mrs. White attended Durham Business College in Houston, Texas and was employed by Anderson Clayton & Co. She resigned from Anderson Clayton & Co. to join Fayez Sarofim when he founded the company.

Mrs. White is a member of the Board of the University of St. Thomas, CHRISTUS Foudnation for Healthcare, and Herman Eye Fund.
